name: Pumpkin Chuck (tutmo)
description:
Created for the Great Autumn Game Jam 2021 - All Code, 3D Models, Animations, Sprites (Images), Music, and SFX were created from scratch within the game jam's 3-week time limit. 

Devlog coming soon, consider subscribing -> www.youtube.com/tutmo

Objective
Chuck pumpkins at targets, collect seeds, and buy upgrades from farmer Chuck!

Controls
Move: WASD Keys
Look: Mouse
Interact: Left-click
Jump: Space
***Tip - Move backwards while aiming the pumpkin to increase launch force.

Credits
tutmo - Code, SFX, Music
jpfuzzerton - 3D Models, Animations, Images

Tools 
Game Engine - Unity
Music/SFX - FL Studio & Audacity
3D Models - Blender
Sprites/Textures - Photoshop & Procreate
